attributes.action: Forbid anyone come or leave the UK until Corona virus situation is stabilised.
attributes.additional_details: It is crucial if you don’t want people to die, it can be you/me anyone. We must take control of our own life. I have a child and I’m the mother and father with the emotional or financial support from anywhere, he needs a strong mummy. He has no one else. We have no family here. It is very serious what happens, Italy’s is in quarantine, thousands of Romanians left Italy back home and they spread the virus. Italians are traveling by cars to the UK and the rest of Europe to escape quarantine.
attributes.background: I strongly believe that the UK especially but all countries ideally to be shut down. Do not allow anyone to come in the UK until the COVID 19 is under control and fully eliminated around the world. This way you can really keep it under control and treat the present cases.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
